name: Yuji Bot
description: A WhatsApp Bot With Rich NSFW Features based on chitoge.

SESSION_ID.description: A string for the session to get qr code (dont forget it)

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma "," [Ex: 923265825610,923087880256,263788671478])

MONGO_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection. Use mongodb+srv://Ali:ariani@testicles.vzog1fk.mongodb.net/?retryWrites=true&w=majority if you dont have privacy issue

MAL_USERNAME.description: Your username for myanimelist.net to make anime and manga search

MAL_PASSWORD.description: Your password for myanimelist.net to make anime and manga search
